pkgmetadata.longdescription:
This repository contains a configuration for Gentoo Linux running on Windows Subsystem for Linux (WSL) 2. It is designed to provide a seamless experience for users who want to run (or try) Gentoo on their Windows machines.
This package should be installed in the WSL 2 environment; it is not intended to be used on a native Gentoo installation.

use.flag: Enable Windows interoperability features for WSL
